verses.text: Out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w deep|strong="H4615"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* sent up \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H7121"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* before \w you|strong="H6963"\w*: \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* awake \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* prayer.

\w O|strong="H4310"\w* Jah, \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w took|strong="H5975"\w* \w note|strong="H8104"\w* \w of|strong="H5771"\w* every \w sin|strong="H5771"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* go free?

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* there \w is|strong="H4616"\w* \w forgiveness|strong="H5547"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H4616"\w* \w be|strong="H3372"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w*.

\w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* waiting \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* waiting \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w hope|strong="H3176"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w watching|strong="H8104"\w* \w for|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w more|strong="H5315"\w* than \w those|strong="H5315"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* \w watching|strong="H8104"\w* \w for|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*; yes, \w more|strong="H5315"\w* than \w the|strong="H8104"\w* watchers \w for|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w hope|strong="H3176"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* full salvation.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* make \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* free \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sins|strong="H5771"\w*.
